overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence across multiple social media platforms, engaging with a diverse audience interested in computational social science, disinformation, and digital research. With a total follower count of 3580 and a consistent posting strategy, Fabio achieves notable engagement across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, leveraging his expertise to foster discussions and disseminate research findings.
